name: Poshan Monitor
description:
The Poshan Monitor App helps Anganwadi Workers track children's growth using WHO standards, monitor stunting, wasting, and underweight, and manage SNP distribution to improve child nutrition.
     Poshan Monitor App is a comprehensive tool designed specifically for Anganwadi Workers (AWW) to facilitate the monitoring and management of children's growth and nutritional status. This app empowers AWWs by providing an interactive and easy-to-use platform that calculates essential growth metrics for children, adhering to the standards set by the World Health Organization (WHO).
